prompts: Create a chilling Pokemon that resembles a massive snowball with sharp ice features.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies the essence of a blizzard with icy blue and black accents.
Show me a frosty creature that has a round, ice-covered body and piercing blue eyes.
Design a Pokemon that looks like a frozen face, with sharp edges and a fierce expression.
Generate a Pokemon that thrives in icy mountainous terrains, with a unique shape and icy colors.
I want to see a Pokemon that combines a snowstorm's intensity with a fierce, icy appearance.
Make a Pokemon that stands tall and proud with an icy demeanor and a striking color palette.
